summary: The diff shows configuration and documentation file updates (frontend-file-summaries.txt, index.html, project_state.json) that describe the current codebase state, including confirmation that TeachersNotes has been removed from App.tsx. However, there is no evidence of actual deployment to the Internet Computer production environment â€” no dfx.json changes, no canister deployment scripts, no deployment logs, no canister IDs, and the project_state.json shows REQ-1 status as 'pending', not completed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the current version of the application to production (live environment) on the Internet Computer.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains only documentation/summary file updates and no evidence of an actual deployment to the Internet Computer. No dfx.json, canister configuration, deployment scripts, build artifacts, or deployment logs are present. The project_state.json explicitly marks the deployment action as 'pending'. There is no canister URL or confirmation of successful deployment.
